permission.title: Please allow camera access
permission.description:
Camera access is required to use the real-time posture correction feature.
The screen collected by the camera is processed only on my device.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description:
Let me help you with a few settings before we get started.
This setting is used to personalize your posture correction experience.

username.title: What name would you like to be called?
username.description: You can change it anytime later.

basics.title: Please enter your basic information.
basics.description:
This is essential information for personalized correction.
Don't worry, this information is stored securely and not shared with others.

details.title: Please let us know if you have any physical conditions.
details.description: This information is used to calculate the appropriate rest time.

complete.title: Setup is complete
complete.description: You are now ready to start posture correction with Ulim.
